name: Bryja et al. 2004. Two Meter Shields: From Vision to Reality.
description:
DESCRIPTION
Data for weight of two-meter shield supports obtained at bottom of page one of article (28.2 short tons per shield)

FULL CITATION
Bryja, J.J., Conklin, D.R., Robinson, R.L., O'Neil, K. 2004. "Two Meter Shields: From Vision to Reality." Engineering and Mining Journal. Mining Media. http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_qa5382/is_200408/ai_n21354951/?tag=content;col1 (Accessed December 14, 2009).
